column1: 2980,Amazing Spider-Man (1999) #523,523,72041,21,"""MOVING UP"" It's the sensational Spider-Man versus the horrendous hordes of Hydra as the villainous organization makes its final push to seize control of the country!  Standing in the way?  Everyone's favorite wall-crawler.  But will Spidey have enough left in the tank to take out the group of terrorists and save the day?",
